languages.text: Тайна двери была раскрыта, и странным пророчествам Идиры Тласс был найден ответ.
The mystery of the door has been revealed, as has the true meaning of Idira Tlass's cryptic prophecies.
languages.original_text: Тайна двери была раскрыта, и странным пророчествам Идиры Тласс был найден ответ.

traits.locale_text: The mystery of the door has been elucidated, as has the true meaning of Idira Tlass's cryptic prophecies.
The mystery of the door has been elucidated, as has the true meaning of Idira Tlass's cryptic prophecies.
The mystery of the door has been revealed, as has the true meaning of Idira Tlass's cryptic prophecies.
The mystery of the door has been revealed, as has the true meaning of Idira Tlass's cryptic prophecies.

languages.text: Le mystère de la porte a été élucidé, tout comme la véritable signification des prophéties sibyllines d'Idira Tlass.
languages.original_text: The mystery of the door has been revealed, as has the true meaning of Idira Tlass's cryptic prophecies.

traits.locale_text: Le mystère de la porte a été élucidé, tout comme la véritable signification des prophéties sibyllines d'Idira Tlass.

languages.text: 行商浪人已经发现了大门的奥秘，伊迪拉·特拉斯预言的真正含义也已经揭开了。
languages.original_text: The mystery of the door has been revealed, as has the true meaning of Idira Tlass's cryptic prophecies.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人已经发现了大门的奥秘，伊迪拉·特拉斯预言的真正含义也已经揭开了。

languages.text: 扉の謎だけではなく、イディラ・タラースの不可解な予言の真の意味が明らかになった。
languages.original_text: The mystery of the door has been revealed, as has the true meaning of Idira Tlass's cryptic prophecies.

traits.locale_text: 扉の謎だけではなく、イディラ・タラースの不可解な予言の真の意味が明らかになった。

languages.text: Das Geheimnis der Tür wurde aufgedeckt, genau wie die wahre Bedeutung von Idira Tlass' kryptischen Prophezeiungen.
languages.original_text: The mystery of the door has been revealed, as has the true meaning of Idira Tlass's cryptic prophecies.

traits.locale_text: Das Geheimnis der Tür wurde aufgedeckt, genau wie die wahre Bedeutung von Idira Tlass' kryptischen Prophezeiungen.

languages.text: El misterio de la puerta ha sido revelado, al igual que el verdadero significado de las crípticas profecías de Idira Tlass.
languages.original_text: The mystery of the door has been revealed, as has the true meaning of Idira Tlass's cryptic prophecies.

traits.locale_text: El misterio de la puerta ha sido revelado, al igual que el verdadero significado de las crípticas profecías de Idira Tlass.

languages.text: Kapının gizemi ve İdira Tlass'ın gizemli kehanetlerinin gerçek anlamı ortaya çıktı.
languages.original_text: The mystery of the door has been revealed, as has the true meaning of Idira Tlass's cryptic prophecies.
